General.Name: ARIP Public Company Limited
General.Description: ARIP Public Company Limited engages in the management of events and marketing activities in Thailand. It operates through three segments: Media and Contents, Management of Event, and Digital Service. The company creates, sells, and distributes advertising services on traditional media, digital media, and online social media in the fields of business, management, and information communication technologies (ICT), including Business+, a magazine that provides analysis on the economy, business, management strategy, marketing, and business trend updates, as well as organizes seminars and networking events; Business+ Top 1000 Companies, a magazine that compiles business information of the registered companies in Thailand to list the top 1,000 companies with the highest revenue; and techhub.in.th, an ICT and consumer electronics knowledge source. It also organizes IT exhibitions and trade shows, as well as offers comprehensive event management and integrated marketing services for conventions and exhibitions under the COMMART name. In addition, it offers digital marketing and consultant services, such as online marketing strategy, online communication strategy, branding through digital media, content marketing strategy, creative content, online content management, and data analytic and reports to contribute to the ongoing marketing for the target group, as well as online media plan and buy, including achievement measurement; and enterprise learning platform, an online training platform using cloud technology. Further, the company engages in the production of e-books, advertisements, and content in digital media; production and distribution of IT-related publications; and placement of advertisements. ARIP Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
